DBSubnetGroupDescription.description: The description for the DB subnet group.

DBSubnetGroupName.description: The name for the DB subnet group. This value is stored as a lowercase string. Constraints: Must contain no more than 255 alphanumeric characters, periods, underscores, spaces, or hyphens. Must not be default. Example: mySubnetgroup

SubnetIds.description: The EC2 subnet IDs for the DB subnet group.
